textBeforeTable: Permits to drill in Ashtabula, Geauga and Muskingum Counties in Ohio were issued for the first time.  Also, the Townships of Richmond, Rose, Parkman, Harrison, Meigs and Brookfield will see Utica Shale drilling for the first time. Chesapeake Energy (CHK) continued to lead in the development of the Utica Shale and was issued eight permits. Anadarko Petroleum (APC) received four permits, and Enervest and Beck Energy also were issued permits to drill. The Ohio Department of Natural Resources issued fifteen new permits to drill into the Utica Shale, bringing the total number of permits to eighty five (40 horizontal and 45 vertical). Utica Shale Permit Update 10/14/2011 window.ZemantaBlogSettings = ""; var linkwithin_site_id = 819921; var dc_PublisherID = 16337 ; var dc_AdLinkColor = 'blue' ;
